mapper.select: SELECT a.prod_id, a.prod_name, b.supply_date, c.stcklist_exdate, a.prod_price, c.stcklist_amount, a.event_id, c.stcklist_id FROM prod a, supply b, stock_list c WHERE c.stock_id = #{stock_id} AND c.prod_id = a.prod_id AND b.supply_state = '12'
